description:
Once the protagonist Donny Bogan is successful in capturing Lieri and Naomi with the trap that was set at the risk of his own life, he begins the brainwashing restructuring to reform the women into convenient personalities. Often, night after night, the women repeatedly execute their obscene comfort duty and undergo the perverting brainwashing restructuring. Donny Bogan, who is fired up for cruel revenge, is confident of victory with the pathetic appearance of Lieri and Naomi, who are in anguish because of their restructured bodies that are constantly sexually excited.
Source: Official website`s episode two page, translated by lf412
